description.value:
A shaman who selects the battle spirit gains scars from every wound she takes, and the grit of battle always seems to cling on her body. When she calls upon one of this spirit’s abilities, she grows in stature-becoming taller and more muscular, with a grimace of rage stretching across her face.

Spirit Magic Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jnlr9cuepka1l26e]{Enlarge Person} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.g33euis7yi9pwddy]{Fog Cloud} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.73han2zqxg59u18g]{Magic Vestment} (3rd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.92hth51cs9oi0nfe]{Wall Of Fire} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6ax0ythzw8n4bta8]{Righteous Might} (5th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8xjcrqg79ugxu5qu]{Bull's Strength, Mass} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.578t0lra5ll3aifs]{Control Weather} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.a5gcbpwfhu4hh5ic]{Earthquake} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n4e35m6qu9nmkhgm]{Storm Of Vengeance} (9th)

Spirit Animal: The shaman’s spirit animal looks like a fiercer version of its species, with rippling muscles and a stockier frame. It gains a +2 natural armor bonus to AC. If it already has a natural armor bonus, the bonus increases by 2 instead.
